comment: I cannot say enough good things about this woman. She is so understanding, caring, flexible, and bubbly. She lets class out early by at least 15 minutes every time. All assignments are incredibly easy. The midterm and final were also easy. Open book final. Easiest A. Ever. Just beware - she is the grammar police. TAKE HER SHES AMAZING

Professor Dize is cool as hell honestly. She's always energetic even though it would be like 9:30 in the morning. Assignments are not hard at all. You'll right like 5 essays (campus events). There are a few group projects and unfortunately you don't get to pick your group. I'd recommend her.

She is the best professor I have ever had and easiest class I have ever had. She is so funny and cares for her students. She is somewhat of a tough grader, but you will still make an A if you put in effort.

Professor Dize is full of such a bubbly personality. She cares about getting to know her students and she makes such a boring class entertaining. Just be careful about spelling and grammar. For the required career paper she takes of .5 for every comma mistake! That adds up very quickly. Otherwise, she's great!

Mrs. Dize is super energetic and fun. She comes to class every day with a positive and vibrant attitude! The only downfall is she marks off a ridiculous amount grammarpunctuation. Pay attention to everything she says. She sometimes shows video clips or funny stuff she find on the internet. She will test you on these!

Mrs. Dize took a class that was a joke and boring and lame and made it amazing! She was so funny during class and a very easy grader! Her quizzes are tough but only if you don't read the assigned readings. I would take this class a million times over if Mrs. Dize was my professor! She is so sweet and genuinely cares about her students!

Ms. Dize was the best professor I've had yet. She was always there for her students and really gets to know everyone. She tries to make the class exciting and wants everyone to enjoy their college experience. She does have an attendance policy but other than that, the class was pretty straightforward.

Professor Dize is the best. Period. She will make you never want to miss class. Hilarious, funny,  and personal. Several small papers (*she's an english minor*), one research paper, one group project, few quizzes, and two exams. At the final review, she brought pizza. Take her for the best experience. I am really going to miss her. :( Love her!!

Professor Dize has been one of my favorite professors ever! She is a wonderful teacher who really takes the time to know all of her students. She makes class fun to be in and there is never a dull moment. She provides clear grading rubrics for all of her assignments and gives lots of review for the final and midterm.
Very helpful. She makes class a lot more entertaining.
Very sweet! I Loved her for the KSU Seminar. You do need the books!

Prof. Dize is so awesome! She is helpful, funny, and nice. The class has online journal entries to complete throughout the semester, a midterm, a fair amount of essays, and a final. Don't you dare underestimate this class. Stay on top of due dates or else you will fall behind! Stay disciplined throughout the semester and enjoy! ^_^ I got an A+!

She is very funny teacher. I've got C only because i missed several assignments. The only thing is that you always have a huge amount of assignment. Cannot say that its an easy A but if you do everything on time you will be fine. Only 1 midterm and final. Also, i had only 1 extra credit assignment which worth 5 points. Just follow the due dates.

Extremely easy class. I am in the process of taking the class and have only made below a 100 on one assignment. Plenty of assignments to boost your grade and as long as you complete the work it will be an easy A+
Great teacher Take Her!! For your KSU Class
